metadata.title: CVE-2016-2568 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: pkexec, when used with --user nonpriv, allows local users to escape to the parent session via a crafted TIOCSTI ioctl call, which pushes characters to the terminal's input buffer.

notes.note: mdeslaur> no fix available as of 2021-05-26 rodrigo-zaiden> no fix available as of 2022-02-21.

criterions.comment: policykit-1 package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
